publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology "

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Song of Songs 6
ab.l: Qajra bardy śuv́arij da iźĺajik ol ḱorḱĺuč́a umalar arasyna qajra bardy śuv́arij da iźĺajik any birǵaja.
Śuv́arim ėńdi baɣyna hredalaryna ol otjamnyn ḱut́ḿa baɣlar- da da č́opĺaḿa giĺaflikĺard́a.
Ḿeń śuv́arimniń da śuv́arim ḿenim ol ḱut́uv́č́u giĺaflikĺard́a.
Ḱorḱĺuśuń śeń śuv́ar uma Tirca kibik č́eb́arsiń Jerušalajim kibik qorḥunčlusun alamlanɣan- lar kibik.
Qajyrɣyn ḱozĺarijni ki alar ḱuč́ajt́tiĺar ḿeni čačyj śeniń b́uĺaginiń kibik ėčkiĺarniń ki taraldylar ol Gilʿaddan.
Tiš́ĺarij b́uĺagi kibik qojunlarnyn ki čyḥtylar ol juvunmaḥtan ki barlary t́eńĺar da tuvluḥ joḥtur alarda.
Keśagi kibik ol narnyn č́egij śeniń burulmaɣy sartyn čačyjnyn.
Altymyš alar bijč́aĺar da śekśań šetarzyzlar da öźǵa umalar sansyz.
Birdir ol ḱoǵurč́u- ńum t́uǵaĺč́am birdir ol anasyna aruvdur ol t́oŕav́č́u- ńa öźuniń ḱord́uĺar any umalar da maḥtadylar any bijč́aĺar da šetarsyz qatynlar da maḥtaladylar any.
Kim bu ol baɣynadoɣon šaḥar kibik ḱorḱĺu aj kibik aruv qujaš kibik qorḥunčlu alam- lanɣanlar kibik.
Baɣyna ol qozluḥnun ėńdim ḱorḿa aɣačla- ryn da ol öźańni ḱorḿa jašardymo ol borlalyḥ č́eč́akĺańdi- ĺarmo ol narlar.
Tujmymyn öźumd́a jazyḥ ančaḥ ǯanym qojdu ḿeni ǯomart markavlary arasyna ulusumnun.

app.note: An erroneously written word from subsequent part of the sentence crossed out by the copyist.
